suncertify.nw

Interface ServerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseServer, ServerThreadPoolManager

    public interface ServerService
    This class provides a common interface for various entities on the network server. Each entity on the server performs a service on a request from a client represented by a network socket.
    Version:
    March 13, 2013.
    Author:
    Moses L. Jilugu.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void service(java.net.Socket socket)
      This method will define action that an entity on the network server performs on a socket connection.

    • Method Detail

      • service

        void service(java.net.Socket socket)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will define action that an entity on the network server performs on a socket connection.
        Parameters:
        socket - socket connection to be serviced.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
